publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7746 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Liz Lochhead—That the Parliament congratulates Liz Lochhead on becoming the new Scots Makar; considers that Liz will be an excellent representative of Scottish poetry; recognises that this appointment is in recognition of Ms Lochhead’s contribution to the Scottish poetry world, and further wishes Ms Lochhead future success in her career. Supported by: Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7746 Congratulations to Liz Lochhead (lodged on 19 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ken Macintosh*, Jack McConnell*

S3M-7746 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Liz Lochhead—That the Parliament congratulates Liz Lochhead on becoming the new Scots Makar; considers that Liz will be an excellent representative of Scottish poetry; recognises that this appointment is in recognition of Ms Lochhead’s contribution to the Scottish poetry world, and further wishes Ms Lochhead future success in her career. Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Jamie Hepburn, Joe FitzPatrick, Ken Macintosh, Jack McConnell
S3M-7746 Congratulations to Liz Lochhead (lodged on 19 January 2011) Linda Fabiani*
